_data_sources.ohio_stadium: OSU Athletics / Ohio Stadium official capacity; concessions estimated from ALSD & Levy Restaurants industry benchmarks
_data_sources.schott: Jerome Schottenstein Center official capacity 18,809 (OSU Athletics); 72 luxury suites (OSU Athletics); concessions estimated from NASC arena benchmarks
_data_sources.covelli: Covelli Center official capacity 3,393 (OSU Athletics, opened 2019, $42M build); concessions estimated from NASC small-venue benchmarks
_data_sources.bill_davis: Bill Davis Stadium official capacity 4,450 (OSU Athletics, opened 1997); concessions estimated
_data_sources.jesse_owens: Jesse Owens Memorial Stadium official capacity 9,600 (OSU Athletics); primarily track & field, also men's/women's soccer
_data_sources.huntington_park: Huntington Park official capacity 10,100 (Columbus Clippers / MiLB); concessions from minor league industry benchmarks
_data_sources.nationwide_arena: Nationwide Arena official capacity 18,500 (Columbus Blue Jackets / NHL); concessions from arena industry benchmarks
_data_sources.historic_crew_stadium: Historic Crew Stadium official capacity 20,145 (Columbus Crew SC); concessions from MLS venue benchmarks

crowd._source: ESTIMATED: High baseline energy for perennial top-5 program with 100+ consecutive sellouts

concessions._source_service_rate: NASC arena benchmark: slightly faster than outdoor due to proximity and layout

crowd._source: ESTIMATED: Moderate baseline; program rebuilding under Jake Diebler (hired 2024)
ESTIMATED: Intimate venue with passionate volleyball fanbase; top-15 program with frequent sellouts (6-10/season)

ESTIMATED: Arena events have decent energy but not at college football levels
